titleStmt.title: A memorial of the life [et] death of two vvorthye Christians, Robert Campbel of the Kinyeancleugh, and his wife, Elizabeth Campbel In English meter.
titleStmt.author: Davidson, John, ca. 1549-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Walde-graue printer to the Kings Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: I.D., i.e. John Davidson.
Running title reads: A memoriall of the life of two worthie Christians.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
